targets.query: SELECT last("total_usable_cap_gb") / 1024 - last("total_subscribed_cap_gb" )  / 1024 FROM "Array" WHERE ("S/N" =~ /^$array$/ AND "disktype" = 'FC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("total_usable_cap_gb") / 1024 - last("total_subscribed_cap_gb" )  / 1024 FROM "Array" WHERE ("S/N" =~ /^$array$/ AND "disktype" = 'SSD') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("total_usable_cap_gb") / 1024 - last("total_subscribed_cap_gb" )  / 1024 FROM "Array" WHERE ("S/N" =~ /^$array$/ AND "disktype" ='NL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.label: Array ID
list.name: array
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM Volume WITH KEY = "S/N"
